contentrichtext.text: {{DISPLAYTITLE:''Xanthichthys caeruleolineatus''}} {{Taxobox | name = Xanthichthys caeruleolineatus | regnum = [[Animalia]] | phylum = [[Chordata]] | classis = [[Actinopterygii]] | ordo = [[Tetraodontiformes]] | familia = [[Balistidae]] | genus = ''[[Xanthichthys]]'' | species = '''''X. caeruleolineatus''''' | binomial = ''Xanthichthys caeruleolineatus'' | binomial_authority = [[John Ernest Randall|J. E. Randall]], [[Keiichi Matsuura|Matsuura]] & [[Akira Zama|Zama]], 1978 }} '''''Xanthichthys caeruleolineatus''''' is a [[Triggerfish]] from the Indo-West [[Pacific]]. It occasionally makes its way into the aquarium trade. It grows to a size of 35 cm in length. ==References== * {{FishBase species | genus = Xanthichthys | species = caeruleolineatus| month = December| year = 2008}} [[Category:Balistidae]] [[Category:Animals described in 1978]] {{Perciformes-stub}}
